quotes.quote: Travel around the world is amazing. New people. New-found family, really.
The ideal is to feel at home anywhere, everywhere.
Traveling tends to magnify all human emotions.
Travel brings wisdom only to the wise. It renders the ignorant more ignorant than ever.
Whenever you go on a trip to visit foreign lands or distant places, remember that they are all someone's home and backyard.
The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
Traveling is a fool's paradise. Our first journeys discover to us the indifference of places.
Traveling is like flirting with life. It's like saying, I would stay and love you, but I have to go; this is my station.
One of the great things about travel is you find out how many good, kind people there are.
You lose sight of things and when you travel, everything balances out.
Travel is the frivolous part of serious lives, and the serious part of frivolous ones.
Some beautiful paths can't be discovered without getting lost.
Travel brings power and love back into your life.
One recognizes one's course by discovering the paths that stray from it.
See the world. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories. Ask for no guarantees, ask for no security.
Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
Travelling expands the mind rarely.
Traveling it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.
To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
Traveling outgrows its motives. It soon proves sufficient in itself. You think you are making a trip, but soon it is making you or unmaking you.
Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.
It is not the destination where you end up but the mishaps and memories you create along the way!
Experience, travel these are as education in themselves
For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return.
Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit.
It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
Travel and change of place impart new vigor to the mind.
Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
